articles.title: 이글루코퍼레이션, 국내 유일 美·佛·韓 선급 보안 인증 획득
articles.description: 프랑스(BV)·한국(KR) 이어 미국(ABS) ‘UR E27’ 인증 획득... 3대 선급 기술 검증 완료현대LNG해운 선박 3척에 ‘SPiDER OT’ 구축하며 해양 사이버보안 시장 선점[보안뉴스 조재호 기자] 이글루코퍼레이션이 주요 국제 선급 인증을 연달아 획득하며 글로벌 해사 보안 시장에서의 기술적 우위를 확인했다.이글루코퍼레이션은 프랑스선급(BV),
articles.summary: 이글루코퍼레이션이 주요 국제 선급 인증을 연달아 획득하고 해양 공격자의 수요일에 기상 시스턴스로 확인할 수도다.
points: 이글루코퍼레이션이 BV, KR, ABS 세후에서의 선급 인증 획득
해양 공격자(해양 스타일)로 기술적 우위를 능가하고, SSN으로 AIS 추적
SSP에서도 이런 경우이다.
articles.insight: 해양 공격자가 확보한 SSN을 사용하여 AIS 추적하여 국내 선박의 경로를 제어할 수도다.

articles.title: 민관합동조사단이 ‘현관 비번 실제 조회 2609건’ 누락?... “쿠팡 주장 틀려”

articles.title: 세연테크 PTZ IP카메라, 국정원 보안기능확인서 획득
articles.description: 기능 구현 복잡도 가장 높은 PTZ 카메라 FW9709-QNR로 인증 획득 인증 통과 펌웨어, 2~12M급 카메라 제품군과 최대 4K 40배줌 PTZ 제품 전반에 동일 적용[보안뉴스 엄호식 기자] 세연테크는 PTZ IP 카메라 모델 FW9709-QNR이 국가용 보안 요구사항 V3.0을 충족해 2월 11일자로 보안기능확인서를 최종 획득했다고 밝혔다.이번 인증
articles.summary: PTZ IP 카메라 FW97tyekeuteu-QNR가 국정원 보안기능확인서를 획득하여 보안기능에 대한 국가 구체적인 이해를 통해 보안성을 향상시킨다.
points: -PTZ IP 카메라 FW9709-QNR은 국정원에서의 보안기능확인서 획득
-보안성이 향상되어 PTZ 카메라 모델이 근시하게 만들어진다.
-국정원에서의 V3.0 보안요구사항을 충족하여 보안기능확인서 제공한다.
articles.insight: 세연테크 PTZ IP 카메라가 국정원의 보안요구사항에 집중적으로 맞춘다면, 이제 모델은 이전보안기능성에 비해 보안성을 강화하였다.

articles.title: 인텔리빅스-빌드엠파트너스, ‘행동하는 AI’ 기반 차세대 빌딩안전 플랫폼 구축 맞손
articles.description: 지켜보는 관제 넘어 스스로 해결하는 빌딩 OS 구현VLA 기반 고정밀 영상분석, 출입보안 기술로 빌딩 관리 첨단화인텔리빅스(대표이사 최은수, 장정훈)가 빌드엠파트너스(대표이사 양재열)와 업무협약(MOU)을 체결하고, AI 기술 기반의 차세대 빌딩안전관리 플랫폼을 개발한다고 11일 밝혔다.이번 협약의 핵심은 단순한 영상 감시를 넘어, 인텔리빅스의 독보적인 ‘

articles.title: 한화비전, 돌 맞은 ‘육아동행지원금’ 직원 향한 ‘진심’ 통했다
articles.description: 제도 도입 1주년, 수혜 가정 280가구 돌파직원 자부심과 애사심 커져... 퇴사율 줄고 신입 지원자 수 증가[보안뉴스 강초희 기자] 직원들의 일·가정 양립과 육아 환경 개선을 위해 한화그룹 테크·라이프 솔루션 부문에서 시행 중인 ‘육아동행지원금’이 도입 1주년을 맞았다.앞서 지난해 1월 김동선 미래비전총괄 부사장 주도로 한화갤러리아, 한화호텔앤드리조트 등
articles.summary: 광고를 통해 IT/기술 업무에서 익명 인기짐이나 의사소통을 위한 포인트를 제시하는 동일한 내용.
points: 한화비전 그룹은 '육아동행지원금'이 도착
점유율이 높아지며, 신입 사원 수가 증가한다.
이로써 직원들의 일·가정으로 축구하기 시작
articles.insight: 이 기사는 IT/기술 업무에서 인 pessoal 아키텀 수요를 위한 관련 기술이며, 이로써 직원들의 움직임을 통해 개인에 익숙하게 만들어내는 전럴지기를 강조한다.

articles.title: [쿠팡 해킹] “2300개 IP로 3367만명 공격”... 이게 혼자서 가능?
articles.description: [3줄 요약]1. “IP 변조 도구·자동 수집·내부 구멍 더해져 단독 소행도 가능”2. “기술은 일반적 수준이나 계획성 지능적... 조력자 있을 수도”3. “조회 자체가 유출... 클라우드로 해외 유출 위험” [보안뉴스 강현주 기자] ‘2300개의 IP’로 ‘3367만명’의 계정을 공격해 ‘1억4000만건’ 조회한 역대급 대규모 개인정보 유출 사고, 공격자
articles.summary: IP 변경기기, 자동수집, 내부구덕, 클라우드 감쇄로 HI에서 3367만명의 정보를 공격해 놓으며, 이들은 이전과 마찬가지로 교통안전을 위해서 해방하고 있음.
points: 한국인이 3367만명의 정보를 HI에 공격하여 2300개의 IP로 내부구덕을 높혔다
HCI 기술자들은 사용자가 볼이는 소스와 연결하기 위해서 공격자를 어리뜨게 잡아내고 클라우드로 이들의 정보를 제공했다
이러한 유출자들은 일반적인 비밀번호보안 규모에서도 유효성을 위해서 소지여부를 잃어버렸다
articles.insight: 이러한 개인정보 공격은 IT/기술 업계에서 일반적인 보안 위협을 의미하지만, 이러한 경우에도 단독의 공격자가 사용자와 어리뜨게 잡아내기는 조화로운 방식을 보여준다.

articles.title: [eGISEC 2026] 드림시큐리티, Magic PKI
articles.description: 공개 키 기반 인증 인프라 솔루션3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 드림시큐리티는 1998년 설립된 국내 1세대 디지털 보안 전문기업으로, 대한민국 보안 기술 표준을 선도해 왔다.PKI(공개 키 기반 구조) 분야에서 독보적인 기술력과 경험을 보유하고 있으며, 양자내성암호를 자체 구현해 솔루션에 적용함으로써 포스트 양자

articles.title: [SECON 2026] 다원테크, CCTV 회전형 폴
articles.description: 조달청 특허 등록된 CCTV 회전형 폴3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 다원테크는 20여년의 축적된 기술력과 노하우를 바탕으로 CCTV 및 보안 관련 설비를 전문적으로 생산하는 기업이다. 카메라 폴, 브라켓, 함체, 모니터렉, 태양광 폴 및 브라켓, 터널표시 등 다양한 제품을 자체 설계 및 제작하고 있다.다원테크는 조

카메라 폴, 브라켓, 함체, 모니터렉, 태양광 폴 및 브라켓, 터널표시 등 다양한 제품을 자체 설계 및 제작하고 있다
IT 업계의 중요한 변화와 트렌드
articles.insight: 이 뉴스는 IT 업계의 최신 동향을 보여주며, 기술 발전과 시장 변화에 대한 중요한 정보를 제공합니다.

articles.title: AI inference startup Modal Labs in talks to raise at $2.5B valuation, sources say
articles.description: General Catalyst is in talks to lead the round for the four-year-old startup, according to our sources.
articles.summary: AI inference startup Modal Labs could raise $2.5 billion at a valuation with General Catalyst leading as investors' interest grows.
points: General Catalyst is in talks to lead the round for AI startup Modal Labs, which has been valued between $1 billion and $1.3 billion before this potential funding
Modal Labs plans a post-money valuation of up to $2.5 billion after its latest round if all goes well
The company' endorses the 'AI first, data second,' approach which could attract more investments in AI
articles.insight: This funding round indicates a growing confidence and belief among major venture capital firms that Modal Labs can deliver on its ambitious goals within the burgeoning artificial intelligence market.

articles.title: OpenAI disbands mission alignment team
articles.description: The team's leader has been given a new role as OpenAI's chief futurist, while the other team members have been reassigned throughout the company.
articles.summary: OpenAI disbands its mission alignment team but appoints a new leader within the organization.
points: The OpenAI leadership has reassigned former members of their now-defunct 'mission' team, giving them different roles across the company
Former chief futurist and head curator Adam Kingsmith will lead the newly appointed mission alignment group within OpenAI.
Disbandment was due to a need for better internal focus on open AI directionality
articles.insight: The disbursement of the team highlights potential issues with maintaining consistent and directed growth in ethical artificial intelligence, emphasizing an increased demand within organizations for clearer strategies.

articles.title: Apple’s Siri revamp reportedly delayed… again
articles.description: While the new Siri was expected to launch with the upcoming iOS 26.4 update in March, now, the changes are expected to roll out more slowly over time, reportedly postponing some features until the May iOS update, or even until the release of iOS 27 in September.
articles.summary: Apple's Siri revamp is delayed with certain enhanctheds expected to arrive post-iOS 26.4 update and others potentially introduced alongside iOS 27.
points: The introduction of the revised version of Apple’s virtual assistant, Siri, has been pushed back beyond its initial rollout timeframe with some features getting delayed until May or September's iOS release.
Apple continues to refine and improve functionality for AI assistants even as updates are released.
The company did not specify which particular enhancements were being postponed, only that the rollout of certain improvements would be slower than anticipated.
articles.insight: This delay in updating Siri indicates Apple's commitment to delivering a polished and more advanced assistant experience; however, it might affect user satisfaction with frequent but incremental updates instead of consistent overhauls every year.

articles.title: Uber Eats launches AI assistant to help with grocery cart creation
articles.description: Uber Eats launched a new AI feature, “Cart Assistant,” that can automatically add items to your cart based on text or image prompts.
articles.summary: Uber Eats has introduced an AI-driven Cart Assistant capable of creating shopping lists by adding products from the user's wishlist.
points: The new 'Cart Assistant' feature enables automatic addition of items to online grocery carts via text or image prompts, drawing inspiration from AI-driven tools like Spoonbend.
articles.insight: This innovative integration could significantly reduce the time and effort users spend planning their meals while increasing accuracy in dietary management for individuals with specific food requirements. As it becomes more commonplace, similar features might further reshape online grocery shopping experiences across various e-commerce platforms.

articles.title: Who will own your company’s AI layer? Glean’s CEO explains
articles.description: Enterprise AI is shifting fast from chatbots that answer questions to systems that actually do the work across an organization. But who will own the AI layer that powers all of it? Glean, which started as an enterprise search product, has evolved into what it calls an “AI work assistant,” aiming to sit underneath other AI […]
articles.summary: The article discusses the evolution of Enterprise Artificial Intelligence (AI) from simple chatbots into systems capable of doing work across organizations. Glean is positioning its AI as a foundational layer that supports these advanced enterprise AIs, raising questions about ownership.
points: Enterprise AI is evolving to perform tasks beyond answering queries and needs an underlying infrastructure for complex operations within organizations.
Glean has transformed from an enterprise search product into a comprehensive 'AI work assistant' that could become the essential backbone of modern Enterprise AI systems.
The article raises critical questions about who should own this pivotal layer in company infrastructure, implying its significance for competitive advantage.
articles.insight: As companies increasingly rely on complex enterprise AIs to gain a business edge, determining ownership of the foundational AI components becomes crucial. This will likely become an important strategic decision as technology continues to advance and reshape industries.

articles.title: Microsoft says hackers are exploiting critical zero-day bugs to target Windows and Office users
articles.description: Critical security flaws targeting Windows and Office users allow hackers to take complete control of a victim's computer by clicking a malicious link or opening a file. Patch now.

articles.title: How to get into a16z’s super-competitive Speedrun startup accelerator program
articles.description: TechCrunch spoke to a16z partner Joshua Lu for some tips on standing out for the Speedrun program.
articles.summary: Joshua Lu from a16z shares insights into how companies can stand out in the competitive world of startup accelerators like Speedrun.
points: a16z's Speedrun program is extremely selective, so standing out requires unique value propositions and clear business models
Prior experience with a360 or other mentorship programs can be beneficial due to the non-technical nature of early stage startup activities in accelerators
Having an end goal for joining Speedrun beyond just funding, such as specific industry connections and tailored feedback
articles.insight: The article emphasizes that success within a16z's competitive programs like Speedrun requires more than technical excellence; it demands strategic planning with clear value propositions.

articles.title: Cash App adds payment links so you can get paid in a DM
articles.description: The new feature allows users to share payment requests in a variety of digital settings.
articles.summary: Cash App has introduced the ability for users to request and share payments through direct links within various digital platforms.
points: The Cash App feature enables sharing payment requests using a unique link that can be accessed by others with your permission.
This new functionality extends beyond typical cash transfer methods, allowing transfers via email, text message (SMS), and social media direct messages (DM).
Cash Apple Pay is an optional service within the Cash App feature set.
articles.insight: The introduction of payment links in popular digital environments by a major player like Cash App could significantly change how payments are shared among friends and family, potentially affecting other financial services that rely on peer-todependent sharing models.

articles.title: Amazon’s new eero Signal keeps you connected to the internet when outages occur
articles.description: A new device from eero will keep you online even if your ISP goes down.
articles.summary: A new device from eero will keep you online even if your ISP goes down
points: A new device from eero will keep you online even if your ISP goes down

Important changes and trends in the IT industry

articles.title: The search is on: 2026 Joseph C. Belden Innovation Award nominations are open
articles.description: Nominations for the 2026 Joseph C. Belden Innovation Award are open, inviting SMBs with groundbreaking innovation a chance to win scaling opportunities. Last day to apply is February 13.
articles.summary: Small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) can now nominate themselves or others for the Joseph C. Belden Innovation Award by February 13. The award recognizes innovative solutions that provide SMB recipients with a chance to scale their operations, potentially leading to rapid growth.
points: The Joseph C. Belden Innovation Award has opened nominations for the upcoming event in 2026.
SMBs seeking groundbreaking innovations are invited to apply by February 13.
Winners will have scaling opportunities leading to potential rapid growth.
articles.insight: This award presents a significant opportunity for SMBs in the IT/technology industry, recognizing and enabling disruptive business solutions that facilitate expansion. The competition encourages innovative thinking within this sector and rewards those who can effectively scale their ideas into successful products or services.

articles.title: Activist investor Ancora publicly opposes the WBD-Netflix deal
articles.description: An investment group is trying to sway Netflix shareholders to reject the WBD deal in favor of Paramount.
articles.summary: Activist investor Ancora opposes a proposed merger between WarnerMedia and Discovery Communications (WBD), advocating for Netflix to merge with its rival Paramount instead.
points: Ancora, an activist shareholder group of hedge fund Ridgewood Associates LP led by Roy C. Williams II has filed a proxy statement urging the rejection of WarnerMedia'ner Discovery merger in favor of Netflix and Paramount.

This unprecedented move seeks to merge WBD with itself, creating an entity that would be headquartered on Wall Street but owned by Hollywood through its ownership stake in ViacomCBS. The new combined company could compete directly against Disney+, HBO Max and Apple TV Plus.
The group argued Netflix's merger will provide it with the scale necessary to expand into original content production while Paramount has a proven track record of creating popular shows like Friends.
articles.insight: This news indicates that investor activism is becoming an influential force in shaping corporate strategies within the entertainment industry, as shareholders now have more leverage to propose and support alternative business models for companies under their control. The potential rivalry between Netflix-Paramount combo versus other streaming platforms like Disney+ could intensify competition.

articles.title: DOJ says Trenchant boss sold exploits to Russian broker capable of accessing ‘millions of computers and devices’
articles.description: The former boss of the L3Harris-owned hacking and surveillance tools maker Trenchant faces nine years in prison for selling several exploits to a Russian broker, which counts the Russian government among its customers.
articles.summary: The Department of Justice has charged the former CEO of Trenchant Technologies with criminal offenses for selling exploits to a broker linked with Russian interests.
points: Former CEO faces nine years in prison
Exploits sold included tools like Stuxnet and BlackEnergy
Russian government listed as customer
articles.insight: This case highlights the potential risks associated with cybersecurity exploit trading, especially when these capabilities are in the hands of foreign national security interests.

articles.title: Why the economics of orbital AI are so brutal
articles.description: A 1 Gw orbital data center would cost roughly $42.4B—almost three times its ground-bound equivalent.
articles.summary: Orbital AI systems face significant economic challenges due to their high costs compared to terrestrial alternatives.
points: The estimated cost for a GW-scale orbital data center is around $42.4 billion, nearly triple the price of an equivalent ground installation.
Satellite constellations with similar capabilities can be deployed more economically at approximately half that expense.

Despite higher initial investments and operational difficulties like launching into geostationary orbit or maintaining in-orbit servicing, the allure of lower latency may drive companies to pursue orbital AI.
articles.insight: The significant cost differential between terrestrial and orbital data centers suggests that only high-value services with sufficient return on investment could justify such expensive endeavors in the IT/technology industry, potentially reshaping market expectations around latency improvements.

articles.title: Threads’ new ‘Dear Algo’ AI feature lets you personalize your feed
articles.description: The platform's new feature lets users tell Threads what they temporarily want to see more or less of in their feed.
articles.summary: The platform's new feature lets users tell Threads what they temporarily want to see more or less of in their feed
points: The platform's new feature lets users tell Threads what they temporarily want to see more or less of...

articles.title: Google releases the first beta of Android 17, adopts a continuous developer release plan
articles.description: Google is changing how developers get access to new APIs and features of the latest version.
articles.summary: The tech giant Google has released its first beta test for Android 17 while adopting a continuous developer release plan.
points: Google is shifting to providing access to new APIs and features of the latest version on an as-they-are basis, rather than after each major update cycle.
The move represents Google's first beta test for Android following its transition towards more continuous releases starting with Chrome OS in September 2decmber last year.
This change is intended to provide developers quicker access to the latest features and improvements.
articles.insight: Google’s adoption of a developer release plan mirroring that used for its own operating system, Android Patch Policy (APP), will likely result in faster delivery of new APIs and functionalities. This could potentially disrupt existing mobile apps not ready to adapt quickly enough, necessitating timely updates.

articles.title: How AI changes the math for startups, according to a Microsoft VP
articles.description: Amanda Silver is a corporate vice president at Microsoft’s CoreAI division, where she works on tools for deploying apps and agentic systems within enterprises.
articles.summary: Microsoft'ner Vice President Amanda Silver discusses how AI impacts startup operations and deployment of applications in large organizations.
points: Amanda Silver emphasizes the importance of understanding organizational structure when deploying apps with Microsoft's CoreAI division tools to ensure smooth integration within enterprises.
She highlighted that startups face unique challenges compared to larger corporations due to their size, which requires a tailored approach for AI deployment and optimization.
Amanda also shed light on the importance of continuous learning as part of an effective strategy in utilizing AI technologies.
articles.insight: The news underscores that startups can benefit from Microsoft's CoreAI division tools when deploying applications, but require tailored strategies due to their unique challenges compared to larger organizations. Additionally, continuous learning is crucial for success in utilizing AI technologies.

articles.title: UpScrolled’s social network is struggling to moderate hate speech after fast growth
articles.description: UpScrolled, a social network that surged in the wake of the U.S. TikTok deal, has seen an uptick in harmful content, including usernames and hashtags that contain racial slurs.
articles.summary: UpScrolled's social network experienced rapid growth but now faces challenges moderating hate speech due to a rise in harmful content.
points: Rapid user growth after U.S. TikTok deal led to increased dissemination of racially offensive material on UpScrolled'de social platform.
The network is struggling with the moderation of hate speech, which includes usernames and hashtags containing slurs and racist content.
Company may need to enhance its monitoring systems or implement stricter community guidelines.
articles.insight: This issue highlights a growing problem in social platforms struggling with moderation scalability, which could affect public trust and the platform's sustainability if not addressed effectively by UpScrolled.

articles.title: Senior engineers, including co-founders, exit xAI amid controversy
articles.description: At least nine engineers, including two co-founders, have announced their exits from xAI in the past week, fueling online speculation and raising questions about stability at Musk’s AI company amid mounting controversy.
articles.summary: Nine engineers including two co-founders have exited xAI recently, causing speculation and concerns over the company's stability as it faces internal challenges.
points: The exit of senior engineers at Musk’ran AI (xAI) has sparked online rumors about instability within the company.
Two co-founders have left xAI, further fueling speculation among industry observers and investors.
These departures follow a series of controversies that have shaken trust in Musk's AI ventures.
articles.insight: The exits from senior engineers at xAI could indicate deeper organizational issues within the company, potentially impacting its credibility and long-term prospects. This development may serve as a wake-up call for tech industry leaders to prioritize stability alongside innovation.

articles.title: Twilio co-founder’s fusion power startup raises $450M from Bessemer and Alphabet’s GV
articles.description: Inertia Enterprises will use the Series A investment to build one of the world's most powerful lasers, a key part of its power plant design.
articles.summary: Twilio co-founder Nikesh Tulpule has raised $450 million for his fusion energy startup Inertia Enterprises from Bessemer Venture Partners and Alphabet's GV.
points: Inertia Enterprises, founded by Twilio founder Nikesh Tulpule, is a fusion power company focusing on building one of the world’s most powerful lasers as part of its energy plant design.
The startup has secured $450 million in funding from Bessemer Venture Partners and Alphabet's GV for this ambitious project.
Inertia Enterprises plans to build a fusion power station that will cost around $3 billion, which is expected to be the world’s largest energy plant.
articles.insight: The successful funding round signifies growing investor confidence in private sector advancements towards sustainable and clean energy technologies like fusion power within IT/technology industries. It also implies that these kinds of ventures are beginning to garner support, even from tech giants.

articles.title: Former Founders Fund VC Sam Blond launches AI sales startup to upend Salesforce
articles.description: The startup, Monaco, has come out of stealth as an AI-native all-in-one CRM plus more system backed by names like the Collison brothers and Garry Tan.
articles.summary: Sam Blond, a former Founders Fund VC who worked with Peter Thiel on investment strategies for Facebook's early growth stages, is launching Monaco to disrupt Salesforce by integrating AI directly into their CRM system. The startup has notable backers including the Collison brothers and Garry Tan.
points: Sam Blond starts a new company named Monaco which uses artificial intelligence within its CRM software, challenging industry giants like Salesforce
Monaco'inspired by tech innovators such as Elon Musk is backed financially by influential figures including Mark Pincus (founder of Zynga), Mike Maples Jr. and Garry Tan.
The company aims to use AI across all aspects of sales, from lead generation and engagement strategies through managing the customer journey until closing deals.
articles.insight: Monaco's approach represents an effort within IT/technology industry towards more seamless integration of advanced technologies such as artificial intelligence into existing business processes to create a highly personalized, efficient and streamlined CRM system that could potentially disrupt traditional platforms like Salesforce.

articles.title: Upside Robotics is reducing fertilizer use and waste in corn crops
articles.description: Upside Robotics builds autonomous solar-powered robots that can help farmers reduce their fertilizer use by 70%.
articles.summary: Autonomous robotic system developed by Upside Robotics aims to cut down on the amount of chemical fertilizers needed for corn crops by up to 70%, using solar power and machine learning technology.
points: Upside Robotics' autonomous robots reduce farmers’ need for chemical fertilizers in corn cultivation.
The robotic system is environmentally friendly as it harnesses the sun, a renewable energy source. This can lead to significant savings and less environmental damage due to runoff.
By decreasing dependency on traditional agricultural practices by up to 70%, this technology could significantly change how crops are cultivated in areas prone to over-fertilization.
articles.insight: This innovation from Upside Robotics has the potential to revolutionize sustainable farming and reduce environmental damage caused by excessive use of chemical fertilizers, thus setting a new industry standard for eco-conscious agriculture technology.

articles.title: Amazon Pharmacy to expand same-day delivery to nearly 4,500 US cities
articles.description: The expansion will cover customers in newly served states such as Idaho and Massachusetts.
articles.summary: Amazon Pharmacy is expanding same-day delivery for prescriptions to nearly 4,50 end cities across the US.
points: Amazon will now deliver medication in almost all of America's major urban areas and several states previously unserved by Amazon Prime Picks
The expansion comes after a successful pilot program with around 20% prescription refills through the service, representing more than $15M annually for participating pharmacies.
Prices will be lowered starting in January and monthly subscriptions are also available.
articles.insight: This expansion signifies Amazon's increasing influence on healthcare logistics by enhancing medication accessibility, convenience, and potentially reducing costs through their established delivery network.

articles.title: Build a pipeline and close deals with an exhibit table at TechCrunch Disrupt 2026
articles.description: Get an unmatched ROI by exhibiting your startup in front of 10,000 tech leaders and investors at TechCrunch Disrupt 2026, October 13-15 in San Francisco. Book your table now before it's gone.
articles.summary: TechCrunch Disrupt presents an exhibit opportunity for startups to showcase their products and potentially close deals with tech leaders and investors.
points: Exhibiting at TechCrunch Disrupt can offer a substantial ROI by directly presenting your startup to thousands of influential figures in the technology sector.
The event, scheduled for October 13-15 in San Francisco, provides startups with a unique platform for visibility and deal closure among top investors and industry leaders.
Booking an exhibit table ahead ensures that startups have secured their presence at this prestigious technology conference.
articles.insight: TechCrunch Disrupt's exhibit format provides a focused environment for startup pitches, increasing the likelihood of deal-making in front of key decision-makers within the industry. This event represents an unparalleled opportunity to gain visibility and potentially secure investment.

articles.title: TikTok launches an opt-in Local Feed in the US leveraging users’ precise location
articles.description: TikTok's new Local Feed will show you nearby shopping, dining, events, news, and more.
articles.summary: TikTok has rolled out an opt-in US feature that curates content based on a user's precise location to display nearby shopping deals, dining options, events, and local news.
points: The Local Feed uses the TikTok API for GPS tracking with users’ permission
Localized search is part of an experiment run by Dentsu Digital & Social which will be tested in New York City first
Users can opt-in to receive content based on their current city

insight.impact_on_localization: The Local Feed could significantly enhance personalized user experiences and increase engagement for local businesses in the US.
insight.potential_challenges: Privacy concerns regarding location tracking might affect adoption rates, requiring transparent communication about data usage.

articles.title: Humanoid robot startup Apptronik has now raised $935M at a $5B+ valuation
articles.description: Apptronik has raised another $520 million in a Series A extension to existing and new investors like Google and Mercedes-Benz.
articles.summary: AI startup Apptronik secured an additional $935M for its humanoid robot technology, raising the company' extrinsic valuation to over $5 billion with investments from notable tech companies.
points: Apptronik raises another $520 million in a Series A extension.
Investors include Google and Mercedes-Benz among others.
The company's valuation now exceeds $5 billion.
articles.insight: This funding round signifies substantial investor confidence, potentially accelerating Apptronik's growth in the burgeoning humanoid robotics sector and influencing market trends towards more human-like robots with AI capabilities for diverse applications.

articles.title: Meridian raises $17 million to remake the agentic spreadsheet
articles.description: A new company called Meridian.AI has emerged from stealth with an IDE-based approach to agentic financial modeling.
articles.summary: Meridian.AI is a newly launched company focusing on developing an Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for creating more personalized and complex financial models in spreadsheets.
points: Meridian.AI has developed its own IDE to enhance the capabilities of agentic spreadsheet modeling, allowing users to create advanced algorithms directly within their Excel or Google Sheets environment.
The startup's approach aims at automating routine tasks and reducing manual calculations through sophisticated financial models that can adapt over time with machine learning techniques.
Backed by significant funding of $17 million, Meridian.AI has the resources to attract top talent in artificial intelligence and software engineering.
articles.insight: Meridian.AI's innovative approach could significantly transform financial modeling within businesses across various industries by automating complex tasks that traditionally required extensive manual input, thereby reducing errors and increasing efficiency using AI-driven spreadsheet technologies.

articles.title: [카드뉴스] 탐지부터 ‘자정 능력’까지... 보안 담당자의 새 이름은 ‘AI 감독’
articles.description: 탐지부터 대응까지 인간의 개입 없이 AI가 주도하는 자율 보안 운영 시대가 도래하며 기존 보안 관제 시스템의 패러다임이 바뀌고 있다. 에이전틱 AI는 스스로 보안 정책을 수정하고, 손상된 보안망을 스스로 복구하는 ‘Self-Healing’ 기능을 통해 보안 전문가 부족 문제를 해결하고 있다.이에 따라 보안 담당자의 역할은 반복적인 단순 운영에서 벗어나 자율
articles.summary: AI로 인공지내성되어 AI 감독이 보안을 자유로울 수 digital 보안의 시대를 선명히 나타났다.
points: 인공지내성된 AI가 스스로 보안 전문가 위치를 자동화
AI는 보안 관제에서의 패턴을 학습하여 보안 전략을 수정한다.
스스로 손상된 보안 시스템를 자동으로 복구하는 기능을 가지고 있다.
articles.insight: AI의 발전은 IT/기술 업계에서 보안 분야에 직응적인 전문성과 자동화로, 인공지내용이 보안 역할을 다시처음으로 참조한다.

articles.title: [eGISEC 2026] 데이티스바넷, DataGenor PDS
articles.description: 데이터 생애 주기 관리 솔루션3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 데이티스바넷은 DB 솔루션 개발 및 구축 경험이 풍부한 데이터보안 분야 그리고 IT 시스템 구축 분야 전문가들로 구성된 국내 최고의 데이터베이스 솔루션 개발사다.20여년간 DB 및 데이터 보안 솔루션 개발 노하우를 기반으로 DB 솔루션을 공급하고 컨설팅 부
articles.summary: eGISEC 2026에서 DB 솔루션 개발사 등장.
points: - DB 솔림 개발자들이 전문성과 IT 시스템 구축 경영진의 것을 인식한다.
- 20년간 DB 및 보안 기술에 대해 많은 경륜이 있음.
- DB 솔림사는 최고의 보안과 관련성을 지키며, IT 시스템도 공급하고 컨설팅을 위한 경륜이 모여있다.
articles.insight: 이러한 DB 솔림 개발사는 IT 기업에서 중요한 역할을 하게 되고, 그들의 경륜과 지속가진 업체가 IT 시스템을 구축하기 위해 유리한 서비스를 제공할 수 s있다.

articles.title: [SECON 2026] 디플리, ‘Listen AI Safety’
articles.description: 소리 기반 인공지능 안전 모니터링 솔루션3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 디플리(Deeply)는 소리 기반 인공지능으로 안전과 산업 현장의 혁신을 이끌어 간다.독자적으로 구축한 대규모 오디오 데이터셋과 고도화된 AI 알고리즘을 통해 사람이 놓칠 수 있는 소리를 실시간 분석하고, 산업 환경에 최적화된 솔루션을 제공한다.
articles.summary: 소리를 이용한 인공지능을 강화하여 안전성 확보하고 산업에서의 혁신을 기반으로 제작한 대비궤로운 AI 모듈.
points: -소리 기반 인공지능에는 대규모 오디오 데이터와 고도화된 AI 알고리즘을 통해 준비받은.
-적재가능한 소리를 실시간으로 분석하여, 안전성과 산업 환경에 최적화된 솔루션을 제공한다.
-이러한 AI 모듈은 사람들이 놓을 수 없는 소리를 감지하여, 인위주의적으로 안전성 문제에 대해 방어한다.
articles.insight: 인공지능이 사용자의 안전성을 보호하며, 산업 환경에 필요없는 소리를 광고로 수정하는 방식으로 곧장 이루어진 AI 모듈이다.

articles.title: [SECON 2026] 뉴테크, 조립식 다단분리 회전형 금속기
articles.description: 분리와 회전(360도) 가능한 구조, 편리한 시공과 효율적인 운영 가능3월 18~20일 일산 킨텍스 제1전시장 3~5홀[보안뉴스 박미영 기자] 뉴테크는 CCTV 설치 현장에서 요구되는 고품질 금속기둥을 전문적으로 제조 공급하는 기업이다.용접이 없는 구조설계로 열 변형 및 균열 발생 최소화, 고강도 볼트 체결 및 정밀 성형 및 절곡을 통한 일체형 구조 구현,

articles.title: 중국인 개인정보 87억건 유출... 기업의 주요 정보까지 포함돼
articles.description: 평문 비밀번호 포함, 대규모 2차 피해 우려 확대[보안뉴스 김형근 기자] 중국인과 기업의 정보를 담은 87억건 이상의 방대한 데이터베이스(DB)가 보안 설정 없이 인터넷에 노출되는 심각한 사고가 발생했다.해당 데이터는 약 160개의 인덱스로 구성된 초고속 검색 엔진인 엘라스틱서치(Elasticsearch) 시스템에 저장돼 있었으나, 수주 동안 보안 설정 없

articles.title: 2026년 통신사 보안 기상도, SKT ‘맑음’, KT·LGU+ ‘흐림’
articles.description: SKT, 별다른 악재 없이 투자 계획 정상 가동... 예산 집행·인력 양성 ‘순항’KT, 1조 원 투자 발표했지만 경영진 공백으로 실질적 집행 미뤄져LGU+, 해킹 관련 사법 리스크 및 인력 이탈 겹치며 실행 동력 약화[보안뉴스=조재호 기자] 이동통신 3사의 보안 강화 로드맵이 경영 환경에 따라 희비가 엇갈리고 있다. SK텔레콤은 예산 집행과 인력 양성에서
articles.summary: SK Telecom, SKT '링패'이 기간당 투자 계획을 수정하여 보안약화에 주몸으로써 채움활동으로 이어졌다.
points: SK Telecom, SKT '맑음'이 예산을 수정하여 인력양성에서의 채움을 증폭시킨다.
LGU+과 KT은 보안약화를 위해 연결 사이트의 정작점을 복구한다.
여기에서는 SKT '순항'과 국내 관련 보안 제외적인 광고와 이업이 빌리아진다.
articles.insight: 이러한 최종적으로 SKT이 '맑음'이 보안 강화와 광고와 함섭절하게 모여왔다.

articles.title: ‘친정 기밀유출’, 안승호 전 삼성전자 부사장...‘징역 3년’ 1심 선고
articles.description: 내부기밀 빼돌려 특허침해소송 제기…법원, 보석 상태는 유지삼성전자 내부에서 빼낸 기밀 자료를 이용, 미국 법원에서 삼성전자를 상대로 특허 침해 소송을 제기한 혐의로 기소된 안승호 전 부사장이 1심에서 실형을 선고받았다.서울중앙지법 형사합의28부(한대균 부장판사)는 11일 부정경쟁 방지 및 영업비밀 보호에 관한 법률상 영업비밀 누설 등 혐의를 받는 안 전 부
articles.summary: 안승호 전부사장이 삼성전자에게 특허침해 소송을 받았다.
points: - 안승호 전부사장이 삼성전자에게 특허침해 소송을 제기한다.
- 법원은 보증권을 빈판시행하고, 기재계정과 상대적으로 연방집단이 소송 경로를 갈아타라는 명세로 공격한다.
- 영업비밀 복원에 응동하고, 크게 정직성의 모델을 유도한다.
articles.insight: 이러한 합의은 수동으로 기술에 대한 장애 문제를 해소하고, IT/기술 업계와 관련된 피부살인들의 정직성을 보호하는 것이 목적임.

articles.title: 김용선 지식재산처장, “아이디어가 돈...창업·경제성장 사다리 놓겠다”
articles.description: 취임 100일...‘5대 정책방향·중점추진과제’ 발표김용선 지식재산처장은 11일 “국민 아이디어를 지식재산(IP)으로 발전시켜 기술주도 성장과 경제혁신의 사다리를 놓겠다”고 밝혔다. 취임 100일 맞아 정부대전청사에서 가진 기자 간담회서다.이날 김 처장은 그간의 소회·성과와 향후 5대 정책 방향을 설명하며 “취임 이후 112회 이상의 간담회와 정책 현장·기
